website_summaries.verdict: Available in a wide array of sizes, this inexpensive muzzle will make trips to the vet or grooming parlor much easier for owners.
pros: Soft construction material will not hurt dog – comfortable fit
Works well as a short-term correction device
Well designed, especially for an entry-level pet product
cons: Straps and buckles make a perfect fit very difficult
No protective mesh around the mouth
Does not prevent unwanted eating or barking

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over the internet for a soft, durable, economically priced product. This product is soft and humane. I use it for when my dog is around other dogs. I adopted my dog recently and I am / was unsure how he is with other animals. This works great for temporary, short term use. I would recommend this product for others to purchase. Please note that I did NOT receive this product at a discounted rate. I paid full price for this product. This is my honest review. Please let me know how I did by voting "yes."
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed for an 8 lb Chihuahua, just for doing nails. Size 1
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Byfield

customer_reviews.title: Love these size 1 for two 9 and 10 pound Pomeranian and Yorkie Pom
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my two barking and one rescue biter . I read all the reviews and followed there advise and bought small as to stop the barking it needs to be snug plus they said they would stretch a little in time . When I opened the size 1 (both dogs got this size) I thought oh lord these are to small . Nope works great . They do try to get them off so again glad I bought the size I did . Yes will buy again great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barrie

customer_reviews.title: for a big dog, get the next size up
customer_reviews.text: I measured and thought the size 3 would work on our pitt/lab mix. Harley is 4.5 mo old. The muzzle apoeared like it was too small. It's easy to put on, but I needed to get a bIgger size.
customer_reviews.author: RebeccaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great muzzle
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very anxious and can try to bite when he feels like he's under attack. I introduced this to him with some kibble and blueberries in my hand while placing it on him. I slowly adjusted the clip until he could no longer pull it off with his paws. He really doesn't like it, but it protects us when we clip his nails and take him to the vet for his shots. I think the size I got for him is a little large on him but it made of a great material and I believe will last a longtime. My dog is a 14lb terrier and we got a size 2.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: yip yip yip
customer_reviews.text: I found this a very humane way to stop my little dog when he barks so loud at the worst hours for people who sleep when I take him out early or late. He was confused at first about why he couldn't perform the high-pitched bark but was fine with it. Looks like it caused no discomfort, like a bridle without the bar in your mouth. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: mercury76

customer_reviews.title: Every Dog owner should have one!
customer_reviews.text: She’s small 3lbs and very sweet but she does a 360 and will bite and act aggressive if I try combing hair that gets a bad tangle. Using this muzzle was the only way she was going to allow me near a few tangled areas of her top knot. Every dog owner should have one for such cases of grooming, nail clipping, etc.... This muzzle allowed me a way to get the tangled out and even lessened her attitude while I got it done.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Misleading sizes!
customer_reviews.text: The size guide that you see in the pictures of the product is not the same size guide that is given with the product. I measured the snout being 9in and based on the guide in the pictures it should've picked a size 1. But totally wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Size1 for JRT/Chi mix short little Chihuahua snout
customer_reviews.text: Size 1 for JRT Chihuhua mix 16lbs fit perfectly. I was worried that the strap would not be long enough based on reviews, but it had plenty of length. My dog has a short snout since she is a Chihuahua mix and I debated as to whether or not this size 1 would be too big, it fits just fine. I only muzzle her for nail clippings and tick removal..so it is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Like-it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my puppy that will eat anything & everything when I am not watching!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 month old puppy. I love him, but when I go to my dad's house, I put him in the backyard to let him use the bathroom & he will eat random items off the ground (little sticks, leaves, rocks even) & it causes him to have stomach aches later on. I bought this muzzle to prevent him from eating random things off of the ground while he is outside when I can't watch him. It has really helped him so far. At first I felt bad about getting him a muzzle, but it really has helped him.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on small dogs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. I have a small Chihuahua and she got out of the muzzle in less than 10 seconds. It did not fit her and I purchased the smallest size which was 0. Wish I could return it, but the seller doesn't allow returns. If you have a small dog don't waste your money purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: CandyR

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t fit my 10-pound Chihuahua-Papillion. Plus the material was way too stiff and thick for a dog this size. I tried to return it and found out it’s not eligible for a return. Be aware when you buy! Thank goodness I was only out six bucks or so!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Duluoz

customer_reviews.title: Size is NOT accurate!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini poodle so I bought size 0 according to their chart. And even after extending the straps as far out as possible, the thing still did not fit by a LONG shot. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J. Giron

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My dog forgets that I'm his loving owner and thinks I'm going to maim and torture him as soon as it's time to clip his nails. He bites the groomer relentlessly, so rather than subject them to his abuse I clip his nails at home. So much gratitude to this product for making it possible as well as all the other mishaps and upkeep required caring for my dog. He's lucky he's cute, and I'm lucky this muzzle fits so perfectly that I can keep him looking cute without losing a finger. For reference: he is an 11lb terrier/chihuahua mix and I did not attempt to measure his snout before ordering. Size 1 fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: GERMAN SHEPHARD = SIZE 4
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I wasn't sure so I bought two, size 4 and a size 5 for my full size 1 year old male GS. Size 4 is the correct size. Size 5 was the same head size but the nose cone is wider for fuller snout. Happy with the fit and quality. Good training tool. When I need him to settle down, it does the trick. Now that he's familiar with it, I simply hold it up and he goes and lays down.
customer_reviews.author: Buff

customer_reviews.title: For doggy first aid kit.
customer_reviews.text: Bought sm/med Size 2 for my 16lb Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. It fits perfectly. He's not aggressive at all, but it's a recommended item for a dog first aid kit. We gave him lots of treats while sizing the head strap and he didn't mind that at all. Hope we never have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Waters

customer_reviews.title: fits my 6. 5 lb chihuahua. unfortunately he ...
customer_reviews.text: fits my 6.5 lb chihuahua. unfortunately he needs to wear it for nail trimming. :-(
customer_reviews.author: mgmakeup

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Chihuahua since he hates getting his nails clipped. Ordered a size small but should have went a size smaller ( my fault since I didn’t measure ). Definitely measure first.
customer_reviews.author: Dbosso556

customer_reviews.title: Ok for short term use but not good for heavy use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this muzzle for my australian shepherd. After only having this for a month or two the bottom is almost completely worn through and will have to be thrown away. The strap has to be tightened often to keep it in place. This muzzle does help cut back on some barking which was my main reason for purchasing it. I would not recommend this if you are looking for a muzzle to completely stop a dog from barking. My dog is able to pant, drink and eat with this muzzle on.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is off. It was too small for my dog and to return it cost the same as the product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mills

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle held up better than others I’ve used. It was also right priced. I have an Australian Cattle dog that would’nt let the male breed her. She would lunge at him with her teeth. So I ordered this muzzle to stop her biting. She ripped one side of the muzzle but because the strapping around the front of the muzzle was made out of a strong material she couldn’t rip that off and it kept her muzzle on. I used it for another female ripped and it worked great. No biting and she got bred. It was worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: M.B

customer_reviews.title: This item runs small
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dogs muzzle per the instructions and this item is too small, there is no way she could pant with this on as it closes her mouth completely. The package had obviously been open and returned in the past which to me means someone else had the same problem. I will send it back unless the return shipping costs more than the item itself! FYI... THIS ITEM IS NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Sizes are quite strange, so when I ordered the muzzle for my Doberman it was large for her. I had a seamstress sew it so that it fit better, and it seemed to do the trick. Very strong material, and I suppose that I would have ordered a size down for my dog ideally if I didn't get it "tailored." In case anyone has a doberman, I ordered a size 5, so I would not recommend that size for this breed.
customer_reviews.author: Pure Gold

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Sizing and Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is inaccurate. I bought size 1 after measuring my dogs snout and it is way too big. He’s able to easily pull his mouth out of it. It’s also terribly made. It’s lopsided, so one side is much closer to his eye than the other. It has a soft lining around the mouth area but the rest of the places that touch my dogs face are very scratchy and I’m worried it will cause irritation and possibly wounds. For some reason it’s not available for return, so I’m stuck with this useless muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: no adjustment, better guess correctly!
customer_reviews.text: muzzle seems reasonably well made. There is no velcro or anything to adjust around muzzle of dog. If you measure or guess wrong, or your dogs snout is a slightly different shape you are SOL. Bought a different brand with double velcro adjustment and mesh underneath for maybe 50% more $, that's the one I'm keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Tooluser

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. Arrived fast. Looks well made.
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today and while I haven’t had a chance to use it yet in a “muzzle required citation” I tried it on my 3.8 lb Maltese 8 month old boy. It fit well. He didn’t seem to mind it to much. I can tell he will try to take it off after a little bit (he’s a little fighter sometimes) but come time where we will actually need it I think he will be too distracted and it should do it’s job. I’ll come back and reevaluate after we actually use it if I change my mind about it.
customer_reviews.author: Chace

customer_reviews.title: Muzzle or not to muzzle.
customer_reviews.text: This product caused my dog anxiety and stress. After placing it on him within 15 to20 minutes he laid down on the ground and began to hyperventilate excessively - while at the same time whining and pulling at the muzzle. I removed the muzzle, consoled him for several minutes, and as before the muzzle, he was ok. I would rather hear my dog bark at passing dogs, than to see him grasping for breath and being stressed out -because he can not open his mouth. To me the muzzle ... for my dog is cruel punishment. Never to use again, - We discarded the muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: von Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Size 2 was the recommended size but was NOT big enough for my 25lb ...
customer_reviews.text: Size 2 was the recommended size but was NOT big enough for my 25lb beagle. He had it off in less than 5 mins damaging the product in the process. I suggest spending a little bit more money on a better product as I just wasted $7 on this. Thankfully, it was only $7. May work better if the size recommendation was correct.
customer_reviews.author: A. Palsgrove

customer_reviews.title: If I need to use a muzzle, this is the one I would use
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua is very afraid of new people. I never thought I would put a muzzle on one of my dogs, but this is to protect my dog as much as it is to protect people. This muzzle is made of soft but tough fabric. It is easy to put on and remove. My dog is able to breathe. The size 0 is a perfect fit for an 8.5 pound dog.
customer_reviews.author: Marta R.

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURNS if the size is wrong. The one we got was WAY undersized.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. The sizing charts are NOT a good indicator of the muzzle that’s right for your dog. The one we selected based on the measurements, was WAY too small for out Springer Spaniel and this third party has a policy of NO RETURNS. Evidently there’s small print that indicates no returns so we can’t exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Esche Family

customer_reviews.title: As long as he doesn't learn to associate the muzzle with nail clipping, it will work to prevent fear biting.
customer_reviews.text: I have two chihuahuas...one male and a female. They have different sized snouts. This muzzle fits both, but barely on the larger dog. But for the purpose of using it only so I can clip their nails, it will work. I would not leave it on for a long time because it's so snug on him. Then again I've never used a muzzle on any dog, so it's going to be weird for me. The older the male gets the more he's turned into a fear biter, esp with nail clipping and I'm not getting bit again...I hope. We shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Maximus

customer_reviews.title: Makes nail trims bearable
customer_reviews.text: A necessary item for nail trims for our dog, unfortunately. Our pup feels better about the process if the "party hat" comes on at home rather than at the vet's office. I mean he hates it, but it seems comfortable enough for him and it works. Plus, this has saved us a lot of money in "difficult patient" fees, and you can tell that he trusts that if we're restraining him he must not be in any real danger even if he's freaked out.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to stop night time barking and chewing for a 8 month old Westie/Yorkie mix in an effort to avoid using the bark collar. This worked perfectly and he was unable to defeat this one, and it keeps him quiet. His nose is exposed for easy breathing and he can easily drink water.
customer_reviews.author: UBizz

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for short term
customer_reviews.text: Have a rescue shep. mix, he's great but has potential to lunge at other dogs and has done so. We minimize all risk of biting with the muzzle. For the price, it's been good. Have had it for about 6 months, he wears it every day when we go out to public places. One part is kind of falling off but can be sewn back in place. At the front, around nose, lots of fraying. He could still nib a dog though with it on. We're going for a basket muzzle next instead. Great for travel or limited use but not a long lasting, every day muzzle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great even though it didn’t work for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Don’t think ur dog can’t eat poop through the hole in the front but that’s my fault the product is awesome. He just has a tongue that can pull little pieces of food or poop though the front. Super easy to clean and put on! I’d buy again if I didn’t need to stop them from eating. It would work great for a bitter or Barker
customer_reviews.author: john m.

customer_reviews.title: Size 2 great for my 20lb maltese-y mix
customer_reviews.text: I generally go for sizing with "beagle" (size 2) and "jack russell terrier" (size 1) and another reviewer uploaded the included pamplet a that lists those as 2 separate sizes. I was too lazy to measure, and went with the larger size 2. Works just fine, she's able to lick her nose and everything, doesn't seem like it'll come off too easily. It's just a simple fabric muzzle, so I don't think this would be appropriate for a larger dog that's actually aggressive, but should work just fine for my "just in case" measures.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED: I'm an idiot, and I was using it upside-down. Works great! I ordered a small for my chihuahua from other Amazon customers' recommendations. Bad decision, it is WAY too large. I don't even think the extra-small will fit. I'll need an entirely different brand. My chihuahua is 9lbs but she must have a particularly small snout.
customer_reviews.author: Ramble Trickery

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit toy yorkie
customer_reviews.text: My yorkie does not like this at all. She’s a 24/7 barker this harness muffles her bark but by 10 minutes of just wearing it around the house she was panting very heavy. I’ve purchased three different sizes and they are all to big for a toy yorkie but they do help with biting The only issue was she could take it off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaljolene

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: fits my 60lbs pit-mix. She def doesnt love it but she tolerates it. I only use if while we are in my building once we step foot outside it comes off. Since we once had an incident with an aggressive small dog that was off leash in the building and attacked us, she sent him to the hospital. Just using this to avoid that happening again even though it was not her fault. I can also feed her small treats with this muzzle and her mouth can be slightly open not much.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This said size 3 fits German Shepherds, well NO it does not. The quality doesn’t seem to well made either. I bought this since my GSD is having hip issues and we need to help him in and out of our trucks. He gets upset when you attempt to picks him up mostly because of his hips bothering him. This items was a big fail.
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed- Stiff & cheap
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is stiff and vinyl-like. Only way I would recommend this is for very limited applications. I bought #4 for use on a labrador retriever and strap is maxed out, but muzzle is proper sized. Do not buy it if you're looking for one to wear for walks, etc. I only use to clip his nails.
customer_reviews.author: KSMan

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is WAY off!
customer_reviews.text: From the description of Size 1: Top of muzzle measures: 1 1/4" Bottom of muzzle measures: 4" From my own measuring the top of the muzzle is 1", and the bottom is 3", doesn't fit at all. The "soft inner lining" is about 3/4" of thin cotton, not really what I was expecting. I wouldn't buy this brand again, as I don't trust their sizing at all, and with something like a muzzle, if it doesn't fit it won't work, which can be very dangerous, for the dog and others.
customer_reviews.author: mspol

customer_reviews.title: Size and quality not as described
customer_reviews.text: I tried to exchange but you can't, so I advise you get a size smaller than normal plus iten is very stiff and bottom part so long byou cannot put all the way on, you're forced to stop at throat! thanks
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This muzzle fits perfect on my Shih Zhu/Toy Poodle/Chihuaua dog mix. The item looks well made and easy to adjust the the length of the straps if need be. The material isn't stiff around the snout but has some give to it, so it should be more comfortable I would think, for my dogs when I have to use the muzzle on them.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Like it lots
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog walker.I have this one border collie whom just wants to bite other dogs and harm them.I have to use this muzzle on her if I choose to walk her with another dog. It works! I just put it on and walk her with other dogs.She wants to get off the muzzle and tries too...I just don't let her and make her keep walking. The dog CAN breathe out of its nose and open the mouth slightly. I see the border collie tongue out sometimes like licking. I am glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ortega

customer_reviews.title: From gross and mean, to quick and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my mean, ornery chihuahua when I clip his talons. If not, he growls and bites me. He also gets riled up and poops on me if I take too long with his nails. However, with the use of this muzzle, I can make quick work of his nail clipping, so as to avoid getting bitten and crapped on.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Useful and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my silky terrier who is the cutest, but likes to bite strangers when they come to our house. At first I wasn't sure if I should get a size 1 or 2, but I'm glad that I bought a size 1, because it fits my dog's snout perfectly. There is a strap that is adjustable to fit around the dog's head. The size that I bought for my dog was tight enough for him to not open his mouth, but allows him to lick his lips/nose. He's never worn a muzzle before, so he kept pawing it and tried to get it off, but it was strapped on well and also durable.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: Great for controlling barking!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my dog when he goes out in the morning. He has an invisible fence, so I just let him out to do his own thing for about 15 mins (I can see him through the window). He likes to run up and down the yard barking his head off at nothing at 6am. Not anymore! (although he does try and it's pretty hilarious). It does a good job controlling barking, and it's cheap, so it fits my needs. I would not leave this on your dog for more than 15 or 20 mins though! They will NOT be able to pant properly or drink. It's for short term use only.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Has a calming effect after getting used to it
customer_reviews.text: I’m having trouble breaking LB from nibbling on me, my clothes (while I’m wearing them), and the furniture. SO I bought a little soft muzzle for him to wear whenever he’s being particularly pesky. It seems to calm him down quickly now that he knows he can’t get it off. He really fought it yesterday. Today Hubby had me draw on some teeth just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrye F

customer_reviews.title: Cover up
customer_reviews.text: Product was used to cover dog mouth while attempting to clean his ears for infection. Also, when visits the Vet's Office not his favorite place.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I purchase for my daughter dog (he's a barker) it ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase for my daughter dog (he's a barker) it work for a little bit.. My daughter said that he can still bark with it on but not as much.
customer_reviews.author: james bond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product absolutely buy this
customer_reviews.text: Our pup does not mind this restraint AT ALL. She does not sweat, it goes on easy, you can slip it off easy for a treat. It does not stink, washes well. Make sure to measure the 2 locations as directed to get the perfect comfortable fit. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lakewood Colorado Hobart failure

customer_reviews.title: Wowzer!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for vet vaccination trip for my wild child that don't like other dogs or people! It freaks her out and thankfully I didn't have to use it. Great vet just had me hold her head but was glad to have it handy.handy tool while social training fearful unstable dogs.use caution,very short time as dog can't cool themselves down by panting.
customer_reviews.author: linda rainey

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is definitely off
customer_reviews.text: The muzzle material is what I wanted & expected but the sizing on this product is way off. The breeds do not match the size! Ended up buying a different one that I actually like much more
customer_reviews.author: Shernicole

customer_reviews.title: No more worry about biting people in public!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Shih-Tzu that we adopted from a shelter who can get very aggressive when frightened. She has progressed leaps and bounds, but still has a tendency to snap at strangers. We put this small muzzle on her and now feel more relaxed taking her out in public to get her more used to people. It has the added effect of making people afraid to pet her (muzzles indicate danger) so she hasn't had a bunch of people petting her at once, but rather just walking around her until she's calm. She doesn't associate it with a punishment because we give her peanut butter to lick when we put it on and then she get's a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit for am staff
customer_reviews.text: This was too small for my dog, it says medium/large, I’d say my dogs muzzle isn’t very large. I think it is more appropriate for dogs with a longer snout. Also she chewed off the buckle one day when it was lying around so it is useless now. Can’t even get a replacement buckle
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Trainwreck Lola can no longer bite anyone! Yay! ...
customer_reviews.text: Trainwreck Lola can no longer bite anyone! Yay! Her whole demeanor changes while she is wearing it, What a pleasure and no more expensive batteries for the bark collar!
customer_reviews.author: saltysusan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use while clipping nails on a very testy chihuahua. It is easy to adjust and get on and off. We fit it snugly to him because it is on for just a few minutes...but it's crucial he can't get it off.
customer_reviews.author: JDimaria

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL WHEN ORDERING!
customer_reviews.text: The overall product is nice, however, the sizes are completely wrong! The sizing chart that was sent to me with the product IS NOT the same as the sizing chart that is pictured above. Based on the sizing chart above I needed to order a 1 for my German Shepherd and that is completely different from the sizing chart I received with the product mailed to me. Other than that the product seems durable and nicely made, if only it would have fit for me to actually try and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4-pound Havanese puppy and the zero is really too tight. Actually only intended to order one but apparently through my own oversight entered quantity of two. Sadly no returns accepted....so now I have two muzzles that are too small.
customer_reviews.author: PJ918

customer_reviews.title: Size one has very short straps.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other buyers, the breed guide isn't accurate when determining sizing. I ordered a size one because I have a Jack-Russell/Corgi mix and he's pretty small. I also ordered a size 2 just in case. Size 1 fit his little snout perfectly, but the strap was WAY too short. The size two is fine, but I don't think it's as comfortable of a fit for him. That being said, he could still bark and stick his tongue out. Additionally, it seemed to calm down his aggressive behavior when we were waiting to see the vet. He had it on for maybe 30 minutes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, works great
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought size 3, but it was too big for my 13lb papillon/ cocker spaniel mix ( probably cause he has proportionally small head). But I didn't bother to return it, cause it's only 7 dollars. So I reordered a size 1, and this time it fits like a glove. My dog seems to be very comfortable wearing it. He didn't struggle, just wear it, and sit there quietly. The muzzle stops him from biting people. He resents the presence of all people except for me. I probably still need to restrain him when people came to visit, but the muzzle muffles his barking too. I suppose he can't bark loudly without opening wide
customer_reviews.author: Jin Wen Hui

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 3 for my Australian shepherd. A bit snug. Next size up would probably have worked. Only needed it for a quick fur/knot cutting. The nylon seam ripped within 30 seconds of wearing it. Probably works for small not very strong dogs.
customer_reviews.author: mary ellen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We rescued a shih tzu mix (tiny dog ) who never shuts up. He barks all day every day and we have tried bark collars and they don’t work. We got this and now he’s quiet . Sure he doesn’t like it and is trying to get it off but we needed some peace in our home .
customer_reviews.author: KellyEkleberry

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible description!! This product has a sizing chart, yet the chart is wrong. I followed the instructions for measurements and ordered the size suggested. It was so small it wouldn't fit a newborn puppy. Extremely dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Reads a Book

customer_reviews.title: Questionable sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a zero for my chihuahua based on the sizing chart and reviews. This thing is tiny, it doesn’t even fit around his “mouth” I’m pretty bummed out I was looking forward to at least trying it but no luck
customer_reviews.author: Adeegee

customer_reviews.title: Great little muzzle
customer_reviews.text: My little terrier is a real barker and bites everything. The carpets, other dogs, my legs, everything. This works perfectly. I got a size 0 and this stops him immediately. He calms down is totally relaxed. I only leave it on for a few minutes and he becomes an angel. He is only 5 lbs but has the heart of a lion. Super stubborn and super loud. Great simple product. He tries to remove it for a minute or so, but gives up quickly. It may look funny or not humane, but he can still drink and breathe normally. Sometimes I wonder if he will give himself a heart attack the way he runs and bites. Great little product.
customer_reviews.author: Hillarys Antiques

customer_reviews.title: Good muzzle
customer_reviews.text: We unfortunately have to have a muzzle for our boy, and this one fits the bill. I wanted to get something that wouldn't have the risk of coming apart mid-freakout. I am not worried he'll bite someone who scares him when he has this on. It is very well made, and while he hates it, it does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: Zero size is too big for Chihuahua
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 0 (zero) and its way too Big for a 4.5 lb Chihuahua. No return so It a full waste of money and time. I saw nothing in the description about no returns when I placed the order. Wish Amazon had a way to filter out all items with "NO RETURNS". I would never order anything if I knew it wasn't returnable.
customer_reviews.author: C23

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Mr. Mouthy
customer_reviews.text: I must say, I feel guilty for doing this review. My faithful pal Bailey might have a different review then I do, but it works just as it is supposed to. It is a quality muzzle and I would purchase again if need be. As far as my best buddy Bailey (AKA Hanable) the fierce Scottish Terrior, well, let's just say he has had an attitude adjustment when he's around groups of people. I do recommend if you have a pet who has a tendency to want to bite or nip people or other animals.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Powers

customer_reviews.title: Rough seams on inside
customer_reviews.text: Package says it’s a “nylon” muzzle but feels more like stiff vinyl! While I really want my papillon to stop eating everything he sees that should NOT be eaten I’m afraid this muzzle will only cause me more problems by rubbing sores on him! Hopefully I can figure out a way to put some soft material between the muzzle & his snout or it’ll be useless.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: For my Shorkie Tsu
customer_reviews.text: I got size 0 for my Yorkie/Shih Tsu mixed puppy. She is very small ~6lbs. She barks in the night from time to time but we’re going on a trip and wanted to make sure she would be quiet. It’s the perfect fit for her teeny little snout!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the muzzle was just what we needed to help with clipping our dog. She fought us all the way and the muzzle did it's job. Twice, she actually got her face out but we were able to get the muzzle back on quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Cardullo

customer_reviews.title: It must be comfortable because he didn't mind wearing it or having it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits just right and calms my dog down. I have a 24# American Eskimo and purchased size 2. The muzzle slid right on and my dog stopped fussing while I groomed him. It must be comfortable because he didn't mind wearing it or having it put on. Using the muzzle was an easy fix so I can groom him, whereas before he would keep biting at the brush and run and hide. The muzzle fit well enough that it was not binding and he could not bite me. My dog would not let us put on the more restrictive muzzles but this lightweight muzzle seemed less threatening.
customer_reviews.author: Layniez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Don't like to have to muzzle an animal but this is a handy, comfortable tool. I would recommend it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Nevers

customer_reviews.title: which really is not cool. Best to measure your pets head before purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Westie and its much to small. Description stated for small dogs and included Westie in its description. The muzzle fit okay but the strips were much too short. Strips only reached the side of my dogs' ears. This seller does not have a return policy, which really is not cool. Best to measure your pets head before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Works for a little while
customer_reviews.text: As a dog daycare we have tried my muzzles over the last 10 years. These are pretty much lumped in with all the others and do not stand out from the crowd. We find that they can tear at the seems and after a week or so they become useless. If you have a dog that doesn't mind having a muzzle on you should be fine with this muzzle. If you have one that doesn't like it and will fight to get it off, many times the plastic clasp on the back with break or it will tear.
customer_reviews.author: L. Graz

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed to find a muzzle small enough to fit my chihuahua. He is the love of my life, but he is aggressive as all get out to strangers though! I've had an incident where he nipped a stranger so I can't have that and bought the muzzle. it works like a charm it definitely puts him in his place and I don't worry about anyone getting nipped again. Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Mitza McCordTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: My dog very quickly ripped lacerations in this just by opening his jaw. However, he didn't completely split it so it still serves the purpose of getting him into the bathtub (a time where he becomes terrifyingly ferocious). This is not an option for long periods of time, and I don't imagine it's very comfortable. However, if you need something for just a few minutes as a safety precaution, this works... Although it could be a lot more durable.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Muffles the bark
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my neighbors have complained too many times about my dogs barking when I'm gone, even though theirs do it too. This was my resolution, they can still bark a little but it's not as loud and high pitched. The dogs don't like it but I haven't had heard from my landlord in a while so it works our I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: I might like it for cutting my nervous dogs nails
customer_reviews.text: I might like it for cutting my nervous dogs nails. I don't think he would actually try to bite me, but when the vet tried this on him, it calmed him a little. Trying it at home, didn't work quite as well. He did not like it, but he endured it.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Y.

customer_reviews.title: Size 1 - fits my papillon
customer_reviews.text: My papillon is a little large for her breed and I’ve had the hardest time trying to find a muzzle that fits her snout comfortably without being too loose. I needed a muzzle to trim her nails, otherwise she would bite me. This size 1 muzzle is much like the one my vet uses and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Nmpollard

customer_reviews.title: Sad chi in a stiff uncomfortable muzzle
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely sturdy..but the material is so stiff that my poor little chi looked visibly uncomfortable. I just wanted something soft for when he goes to the groomers but this was like industrial strength fabric
customer_reviews.author: Linda Krajcar

customer_reviews.title: like it should since her snout is short and wide ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is made well and does the job, but did not fit my chow lab mix, like it should since her snout is short and wide and this would fit better for a long and thinner snout. Still it seemed to keep her from being as aggressive and barking, even though I think she had room to bite if she wanted to. I don't know if I ordered the wrong size or they are all made the same, but a good product for the price, if you can get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bristol

customer_reviews.title: Not for Chihuahuas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in hopes it would work for a five pound chihuahua. She got it off in less than ten seconds. It is much too big. Suitable for small dogs probably 8+ pounds and with long noses. Not suitable for breed standard Chihuahuas.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Newman

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product, Wrong fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought size 0 for a small shih tzu dog, but is it too small. Should have fit according to the size chart. The strap that goes around the head it not long enough and it is almost impossible to close, even on the longest setting. It is a struggle to use. The next size up would probably have worked better. Construction/workmanship are fine on the item.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money sizes are wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I threw ours away after I got it. Was a big wast of money! I bought for my Apple head chihuahua but it was bigger then her head! I ordered a small it said it would fit her nose but it did not!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Penwell

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is Way Off
customer_reviews.text: Followed the size chart, carefully measuring my dog's muzzle at front and back. The resulting size was way too small! One reason I ordered this brand was it specified two separate measurements, so I thought it would be an exact fit. Not even close!
customer_reviews.author: T22

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is wrong
customer_reviews.text: Size is way off (too small by far, the chart is wrong) and just found out there is no way to return. Can't even contact the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sarkany

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT !!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect muzzle for my Yorkie / Maltest mix. It fits well and he is not able to pry it off. Perfect for those times when he just wonlt listen..great product
customer_reviews.author: ajs

customer_reviews.title: Keeps nipping/biting at bay, allows for water consumption, breathing
customer_reviews.text: Works well on our english bulldog (she is small for her breed). She's able to breathe comfortably, can get water, and it stops the biting that produces fights/wounds.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Downing

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for clipping my 12 lb dog's nails. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for clipping my 12 lb dog's nails. The muzzle was loose enough that we were able to feed him treats while wearing it, and it distracted him from his usual antics during the nail trimming. I think this will be a helpful product for efficiently and safely grooming him and stopping the cycle of him getting all worked up.
customer_reviews.author: Jemmy R.

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: It fits wonderfully, I got to admit I was a bit worried because my dog is an America bulldog and they have snouts similar to pit bulls (a bit round and short). But it fits, now I just need to train him to get used to it
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: The size they say would work does not.
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered size 2 and it was too large, thought I would return it but they don't take returns, but the packaging said the right size for a miniature poodle is a size 0 so, went ahead and ordered it. Too small. I give up, they've gotten 15 bucks out of me and I'm not giving away any more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lambert

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a tight fit, wouldn't keep on for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I have a mini schnauzer, I bought this for the main purpose of putting in a first aid kit. I tried it on and fitted it before putting it away, and it's a bit tight on my breed. The strap fits well and can be adjusted easily, but the muzzle just seems too narrow. He can't really open his mouth, the most breath though his nose. I'm not sure to get a bigger size (I got two (2) recommend for breeds like a beagle, any bigger were examples like Labradors which seemed like too much). So not something I could keep on for a long time, just emergency purposes.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very stiff and is either poking the dog in one eye or is loose enough that he takes it off. I put it on. He takes it off. I put it on, repeat.
customer_reviews.author: Buttchops

customer_reviews.title: Too stiff
customer_reviews.text: Really stiff fabric. My shepherds muzzle is much softer and more comfortable. I won’t use this on my dog. That seam is hard and not good against her skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good but my dog didn't like it a bit
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while it lasted, but my dog didn't like it a bit. She spent an afternoon getting it off her head, then chewed the buckle the first chance she got when no one was looking so it was unusable. But I don't fault the manufacturer on this. More like I have a very intelligent and tenacious dog. If you have a dog not quite as exuberant as mine, it would work well. I just wish the buckle was metal, instead of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: the fit was to long and a little to wide. i knew i should have went down to a size 2 i think it was instead of a 3 (maybe 3 instead of a 4) i got. it still works for what we need it to do. if i were everyone else i would size down. i have a pom/pompeii, but i even tried it on my friends terrier and it was a little to wide the length was ok. it's strong and durable, def. can shorten if need be. came fast.
customer_reviews.author: Appleblossom27

customer_reviews.title: great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This size 2 muzzle is a great discpline tool for my yorkie puppy. When he charges feet biting or barks uncontrollably for attention, I put this on him and his attitude changes immediately. Not only does he stop the behavior but he almost becomes catatonic. It sort of resets him and then I take it off 10 minutes later and he goes about his business. It has been the one tool that makes me feel like I can take him over other people's homes...it is a safety blanket for me!
customer_reviews.author: deanna

product_meta.title: Downtown Pet Supply Quick Fit Dog Muzzle with Adjustable Straps, Black Nylon, Size 0, Size 1, Size 2, Size 3, Size 4, Size 5, Size 3 XL, Size 4 XL, or Size 5 XL
feature_bullets: See HOW TO MEASURE your dog under the Description below or contact seller
Top of muzzle measures: 1 1/4" Bottom of muzzle measures: 4"
Strong nylon fabric, quick fit dog muzzle
Remember: never leave your dog unattended while wearing muzzle.
